definitions.definition: In a curious manner; with curiosity; inquisitively .
examples: The children peeped curiously into the attic room.

definitions.definition: Oddly ; in a strange or unexpected way.
examples: Curiously , when I arrived home, the front door was standing ajar.

main_definition: In a curious manner; with curiosity; inquisitively .
secondary_definitions: Oddly ; in a strange or unexpected way.
